Item.text: The file {name} has been removed by another application. What do you want to do?

Message.value: Opening the "{path}" file in shared mode may take long time. Do you want to open the file in normal, locked mode instead?

Message.description: Low disk space to perform this operation
Message.value:
Free disk space on disk {disk} is too low. The operation will not be performed. Delete some files and try again.

Note: most Hex Editor Neo operations are disabled when there is low space on disk containing temporary folder. The Save As operation is not disabled allowing you to save the changes made to the file to another volume.

You can disable this check in the Tools » Settings, General Tab. Uncheck the "Check for low disk space before performing operations" option to disable this check.
